name: Dragon Ball Super: Card Game - Fusion World
summary:
Welcome to DRAGON BALL SUPER CARD GAME FUSION WORLD, where you can battle using the warriors from DRAGON BALL!
Make super-powered attacks using Battle Card combos, and accelerate the battle by awakening your Leader Card!
